prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a small spider with a transparent dome on its back.
Imagine a cute bug-type Pokemon living in aquatic environments, featuring vibrant green and blue colors.
Generate a tiny Pokemon with aquatic features and a round body, perfect for a water-themed game.
Design a Pokemon that has both water and bug characteristics, showcasing a unique blend of colors.
Show me a Pokemon that can thrive in both wetland and urban habitats, with a playful demeanor.
Make a Pokemon inspired by aquatic insects, featuring bright colors and a whimsical appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that captures the essence of nature and water, with adorable and distinct traits.
